basics.name: Lavenia Lookabaugh
basics.label: Stack Architect
basics.summary: I am a full stack developer based in the, Kansas area. I have 16 years experience in web development and graphic design, and focus on creating scalable and sustainable web applications with an amazing a / ux.

references.reference: i worked with andrea as a colleague and fellow team member to provide software solutions and innovations to product line. andrea has demonstrated a dedication to performing the highest quality of work. he has the foresight to recognize when to rewrite and / or reorganize existing software and to implement improvements that are beneficial in the long term when doing so he is not necessarily an immediate goal. he always looks at hand meant that during the production phase, multiple departments knew they could rely on his expertise and in that, even when being pulled in a million. over the past 2 years we worked on project, i spent at least an hour every week with him to follow my projects and find ways to deal with complex problems like. he found time to teach me more about php and routing when i was struggling to understand parts of our technological stack and to listen to me when i had a different opinion about the best way to develop a solution.
